messages.title: My top 4 priorities for North East Hampshire
messages.content: Graham Cockarill outlines his top priorities which include saving the planet, stopping bad development, saving the NHS and more police, and stopping Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats aim to combat climate change and save the planet.
Stop overbuilding and expand the area thoughtfully.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Save our NHS and More Police
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase funding and support for the NHS and police force.
Warn against Brexit madness and highlight the potential damage it could cause.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race here in North East Hampshire.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit - Warning: You want to end this Brexit madness? Well, if you're one of the many local voters who realizes the country is better off in Europe...
issues.environment: SAVE our Planet - The Liberal Democrats will create a brighter green future for our children and grandchildren.
issues.health: SAVE our NHS and More Police - Liberal MP William Beveridge who originally designed the NHS back in the 1940s.
issues.lawCrime: SAVE our NHS and More Police - We will add 30,000 more police officers.

community.content: Stopping Bad Development - Shapley Heath - The Truth

images.caption: The bulldozers move in at Grove Farm, west of Fleet.

examples: We will add 30,000 more police officers.
SAVE our Planet. Liberal Democrats will create a brighter green future for our children and grandchildren.
It’s a two-horse race here in North East Hampshire!
Stop Bad Development - You know where they build, they haven't put in school places, doctor's surgeries, or road improvements to avoid if we have more traffic.
Stop Brexit - Warning: You want to end this Brexit madness? Well, if you're one of the many local voters who realizes the country is better off in Europe...
SAVE our NHS and More Police - It was Liberal MP William Beveridge who originally designed the NHS back in the 1940s.
Stop Brexit - Warn about Brexit madness
Jacob Rees-Mogg who sits in the heart of Conservative for challenges.
